ovdesc.p: This ‘L’ type application contains the multi-value list of all the inward files treated successfully on a given date.
It is used by the enquiry SEPA.INWARD.FILES as a pre-selection to identify all the inward files processed within a range of dates.

desc.p: This field holds the Key to the previous table. A sub-value may be used to regroup all the XML messages coming from the same file but recorded under different file keys.
This field specifies the Treatment date.
